patchboard-atlas.spec.purpose: Defines the Patchboard Atlas tool: its intent, scope, design principles, internal data models, and interaction grammar. This document is the authoritative root specification for the Patchboard Atlas project.

patchboard-atlas.gui-scaffold.purpose: Defines the initial Tkinter GUI scaffolding for Patchboard Atlas. This document specifies window structure, panes, and major widgets only. No application logic, routing logic, or interaction semantics are defined here.

patchboard-atlas.component-id-card-inges.title: Component ID Card Ingestion & Tree Projection
patchboard-atlas.component-id-card-inges.purpose: This document represents modeling and steps for the purpose of implementing ingestion of Component ID Cards, creation of ECS entities for each card, persistence to/from disk, and projection of all known component entries into the Tree pane in the Tree pane. This feature does not create spatial placements. Spatial placement is not required for existence.

patchboard-atlas.coordinates-machine-des.title: Coordinate Machine (coord_machine.py)
patchboard-atlas.coordinates-machine-des.purpose: Describes the coordinate machine: its registers, coordinate systems, projection formulas, functions, and usage patterns. Intended as a quick-reference so that an LLM or developer can understand the coord_machine module without reading the source.

patchboard-atlas.rendering-system.title: Patchboard Rendering System Outline & Initial Onboarding
patchboard-atlas.rendering-system.purpose: Define the architectural rendering model for Patchboard Atlas Phase 1, including World state, Render Intent, Canvas Substrate, placement mechanics, execution frame, and governing principles. Wires are intentionally excluded from Phase 1 to preserve focus and architectural clarity.

patchboard-atlas.rendering-system.wires..title: Patchboard Rendering System â€“ Wire Model Addendum
patchboard-atlas.rendering-system.wires..purpose: Define how logical wires will be represented in the world model and rendered through the same declarative rendering pipeline as components, without introducing imperative canvas coupling.

lionscliapp.api.v1.title: Lion's CLI App (lionscliapp) API Documentation
lionscliapp.api.v1.purpose: document how to use Lion's CLI App

tkintertester.with_lionscliapp.spec.v0.1.title: Using tkintertester with lionscliapp
tkintertester.with_lionscliapp.spec.v0.1.purpose: Define the canonical integration pattern between lionscliapp and tkintertester while preserving lifecycle separation and unified execution.

tkintertester.spec.v0.1.title: tkintertester Specification
tkintertester.spec.v0.1.purpose: specify tkintertester -- a minimal, event-loop-native test harness for Tkinter GUI applications without async

patchboard.spec.messages.core.v1.title: Patchboard Core Message Specification
patchboard.spec.messages.core.v1.purpose: Define the Patchboard system, and the core Patchboard message in particular.

patchboard.spec.messages.file-transport..title: Patchboard File Transport Profile
patchboard.spec.messages.file-transport..purpose: Documents how Patchboard messages transport on the filesystem.

spec.filetalk-patchboard-router.title: Patchboard Router All-Aspects Design Document
spec.filetalk-patchboard-router.purpose: complete design of the Patchboard router
